.. _bin:

Bin
===

.. program:: swingers-admin.py

**swingers-admin.py**

.. option:: startproject

    A customization of django's default startproject from django-admin.py.

    If called without a *--template* option, *django-swingers*' default project
    template is used (also `-e py,txt,in,rst` is set).

    For more details about the generated project structure see
    :ref:`project generation docs <project_template>`.
